messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Im a little late to the ssstart of the ssshift announcement, ssso your going to need to deal with the abnormality. Good morning crew, itsss your captain ssspeaking,  we got a misssion from centcom ssso i intend to get it done, ALSSSO i would like to congrat Helpsss on being accepted asss CE. If you need ANYTHING, feel free to pda me and il be right on it myssself.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Tul-Ullis best lizard. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Spaghetti has renamed the station to "Til-Ullis WORSE LIZARD".

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Spaghetti has renamed the station to "Lizards > Smelly humans".

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Will jack grey get hisss metal for ssstanding up to the sssyssstem?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Plasssma isssue almossst dealt with, return to your ssstationsss

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SSSvac or not? thingsss are kinda messsy and i feel itsss jussst better if we leave and sssend in the clean up crew

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Maintenance.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ai, state laws and bolt down upload

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: System-01 (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">its important to keep your suit sensors on max. it could save your life!</font>
